website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a child-size cornhole set at a value price, this is a good choice.
pros: Ideal for kids and indoor use
Combination of board handles and Velcro serves as a carrying case
cons: Small and not as strong as larger models
Not for serious players or use outside in wet weather

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed (and embarrassed) when my grandson opened this birthday gift. I had previously purchased the regular size which is reasonably sturdy. The Junior size is made with flimsy material. if I had taken it out of the box and inspected it before I gave it to him, I would have returned it The size is good and my grandson loves it, but I doubt it will last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Mecier

customer_reviews.title: Two defective sets - would be much better without the laminated sticker as that just peels right off
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and weight for the kids to play. Unfortunately the first set came damaged. The laminated sticker on top was peeling and the velcro closures on the side ripped off after first use. Ordered a replacement set and the same issues. Was debating just keeping them because the size and storage capability is so perfect for my little kids but for $30, it felt too expensive to keep a damaged product. Even if the damage was only cosmetic.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for ages 4-10
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, good size, fair price . I gave this to my 8 year old niece. She loved it. My kids (ages 4 & 6) and other niece (age 6) and nephew (age 5) also played it in teams. They all loved it. It was cold outside, so I loved that these are small enough to use in the house. These are not full sized cornhole boards not tabletop. They are the perfect size for ages 4-10. My only disappointment is that I couldn’t find extra bean bags that size :(
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Eh...
customer_reviews.text: The boards themselves are sturdy and made out of a much thicker material than I was expecting. They Velcro together and have handles to carry so it’s easy to transport. That being said...the boards are WAY too small. They’re far too skinny and short. The hole is oddly the right size, but the small size of the boards makes it look really big. It also only comes with six bags total. That makes it hard to play with four people like you’re supposed to. I would use these boards again at the beach, but that’s about it. I’ll also have to get a new set of bags to use them so that I can have the right amount.
customer_reviews.author: Patti T.

customer_reviews.title: Very fun way to get out during Covid19 stay-at-home time!
customer_reviews.text: We got this @ the beginning of Covid19 stay-at-home orders and it's a nice way to get outside & play on the sidewalk. It IS junior size so keep that in mind (a bit harder to play, honestly, because the holes are smaller) but I like how the boards are velcroed so you can store your beanbags inside of the boards and it fits nicely tucked away when we aren't using it. Very intelligent design!!!
customer_reviews.author: T. Specht

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good quality for the price. Easily portable which is a big plus for us when we take it with us when we go to parks for picnics. Each board has 2 legs which easily swing out. The 2 halves have Velcro on them so they can be attached together forming a box in which to store/carry the bean bags. Just one warning... Because this is a 'junior' game, the boards are smaller and harder to score points. But for us, this is no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Chicagoan

customer_reviews.title: good for indoors entertainment during quarantine
customer_reviews.text: Fit and finish could be better for the price. The top is a laminate that is probably glued on. Mine has a bubble on one of the boards, also the two panels are held together via velcro when storing or transporting - but the velcro isn't well attached (staples on some) and tends to pull away from the wood when separating for setup. Also one corner is cracked (it's painted over so I assume it happened before packing/shipping). But it's still works well as an indoor distraction for the kids during the COVID quarantine.
customer_reviews.author: Mike_4363

customer_reviews.title: Peeling surface after less than a month.
customer_reviews.text: This set is really nice, the beanbags fit right inside the two cornhole frames which Velcro together to create a carry case. It’s super fun to play, and we all enjoy it a lot. However, after less than a month the surface is completely peeling away from one of the frames. I would’ve expected it to last far longer than this. And we have taken excellent care of it. It is only out when we are using it and gets put away immediately after. No exposure to sun or rain.
customer_reviews.author: A. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Very small...
customer_reviews.text: this is a size for small children, definitely not an adult toy. I missed that in the product description. I did notice it before it got here but after it shipped, what a shame. It will be promptly going back as my children are older and I don't think it would be fun for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: M. Scholze

customer_reviews.title: Great mid-sized cornhole set, such a fantastic value! 👏🏻
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a fantastic, legitimate "junior" sized Cornhole. It's perfect for the yard, and my husband and I are loving it. If you are looking for a Cornhole that is slightly smaller than a "regulation" sized one, then look no further, this is perfect. 👌🏻 And for the price, such a great value! 🙂 It's well made with Real wood, so it is not flimsy or cheap looking. Super cute set and extremely portable. Love it!❤️ 😄👏🏻⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
customer_reviews.author: A. Wonder Woman

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: This isn't exactly great quality nor is it very big, but it's okay for it's intended use, maybe a few times...I think it's good for small children, otherwise, I wouldn't recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I can play this game easily with my nine-year-old grandson he can carry it back-and-forth for me because it’s not really that heavy and we really enjoy playing it thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made. Cheaply made. Received product damaged even though packaging had no signs of damage.
customer_reviews.author: ENL

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable Game
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for a family reunion and were really excited to try it out. When it came we found it to be smaller than we expected. We did not realize it was the Junior size. This made it a bit harder to play which was great for the teens they loved the challenge, but the younger kids found the smaller target to be frustrating. We let them step closer. That worked! Everyone played and loved it. We love that it is portable and fits well in the closet for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Rana Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for preschool and older
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for our preschool Open House, little ones loved it and the big kids volunteering had fun too! I also like how everything stores together in one compact set. 4 stars only because the velcro that holds the boards together for storing needed to be re-glued, simple fix.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea K.

customer_reviews.title: This was a perfect gift for my husband
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect gift for my husband! I didn't want to spend a ton of money on corn hole and I didn't want it to take up too much room in the house. This was perfect for what I needed. My son is 3 and it was the perfect size for him and my husband to go out in the back yard and have a good time! Folds up nicely to bring into the house or if you want to pack in the car it does not take up too much space!
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Kids size
customer_reviews.text: Received these on 7 June, it’s now 30 July 2020 and this is what they look like! Keep your money or let the kids play with them and take in house every time.
customer_reviews.author: Novia M. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for adults and kids. We bought it for our toddler and she loves it very easy for her to play and fun for adults. Easy to carry. Size is perfect. Well built - sturdy - overall construction on point.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Smith

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Only lasts a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. They fell apart in less than a month. Spend the extra 50 and buy the actual size version. These are smaller and they bounce around when the sand back hits it.
customer_reviews.author: John Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Nice little set for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price but the way the Velcro is attached is really flimsy it's two stables in MDF. It looks like it will come off when open slowly. Also the laminate is really thin so be careful of that also keep this away from water this type of material will swell up like a sponge. Even with those particular flaws this isn't a bad set for the price. Just noticed the labor is bubbling which will lead to it peeling. This is being returned 🤬
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Too flimsy to work properly
customer_reviews.text: This is really too flimsy for continued use. The legs quickly collapse when the platform is hit by beanbags, which means you have to stop the game and manually set them upright. The only solution is to find some way to fix the legs in place. I haven't worked out how to do that yet, and it might interfere with the unit's portability — the 2 platforms can fold together to make this easy to carry. But, given its poor performance, it's not going to be carried anywhere anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: R. Potter

customer_reviews.title: Huge air bubbles upon arrival.
customer_reviews.text: One of the boards had huge air bubbles under the vinyl. I'm no stranger to vinyl so I tried using a credit card edge as well as a vinyl hand applicator but the bubbles didn't budge. Sending it back for a replacement. If the new boards come the same way I'll just refund the charge and search for a junior set elsewhere. Until then this product will remain a 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Woolard

customer_reviews.title: Great for passing the time during Pandemic
customer_reviews.text: We picked this up to play in our apartment during quarantine. Its a bit on the smaller side, but still very worth the money and entertainment. I'm getting used to its size, both for portability and to better my game.
customer_reviews.author: the4ringer

customer_reviews.title: Small and portable
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect for outdoor and indoor family fun! Very light weight and portable. Recommend placing it on a towel/carpet/yoga mat so it doesn’t slide around.
customer_reviews.author: Brazy

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than most
customer_reviews.text: These cornholes were the perfect size for a small gathering. I purchased it for a glow in the dark party and was going to spray paint it fluorescent however after taking them out we noticed the vinyl over the front began lifting so we just used neon tape instead. All in all they were easy to use, easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Nessa Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Good to take on the go
customer_reviews.text: I didn't read the description well enough and definitely didn't expect these to be as small as they are! But ended up working well enough, especially for the price. I love that they Velcro together and have handles for carrying.
customer_reviews.author: lkveggie

customer_reviews.title: gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought for granddaughters to play since they are locked down they love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor game
customer_reviews.text: This game is great for indoor use during cold boring winter months! The Velcro is strong so far. It holds the boards together so you can use the game as a carrying case to hold the bags.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Pritchard

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a miniature set, cheap velcro, but fun!
customer_reviews.text: This junior sized cornhole set it such a hit at get-together a wig my college cross country team. The target is smaller, as the boards are not as wide as a regular sized cornhole set. The velcro is a little china’s and is starting to pull of which is a little disappointed! It’s probably because of how much use this set has gotten. Still love the game, the price, and the transportability!
customer_reviews.author: MaKenna

customer_reviews.title: not the right set
customer_reviews.text: we got boards, but they are not what the picture looks like, and they are moldy... we have friends that have a set, and love theirs. we will just borrow theirs i guess until i decide to try again ordering
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Portable
customer_reviews.text: Very portable and the two pieces Velcro together and it has handles. They are a little small which makes getting a score a little hard, but not impossible. Great value for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Domestic Goddess73

customer_reviews.title: Simple and usable but low quality for anything other than indoors.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my younger girls to play as they always want to play my corn joke with the adults but aren’t old enough. Simple and usable but quality is very lacking. Decal on the boards had bubbles from the beginning and after one accidental stay in the yard during a rain they fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: BKL

customer_reviews.title: Kids corn hole game
customer_reviews.text: Our 5 and 2 year old grandsons got this for a birthday present from us! They loved it but we were dismayed to Sind that the Velcro closer we held in place by some very long and sharp needle point nails.... The first time the 5 year old opened it the nails pulled out of the wood along with the Velcro..... seems to me they should either be glued down with glue or maybe just a latch of some kind on each side.. spikey nails and little kids don’t mix well!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great colors and portability
customer_reviews.text: The grands love it. They don't get left out when the adults are playing corn hole.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great for Kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my two young nephews and they love it! It is surprisingly sturdy and heavy duty for being a smaller set meant for children. The price is great for the quality of the set!
customer_reviews.author: ChefKronk

customer_reviews.title: Junior Cornhole
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in some of the quality. Colored display plate started coming loose the second time we played, and the velcro that holds it together for storage was just poorly stapled to the wood and came loose when we opened it up the second time.
customer_reviews.author: Tina A. Kincaid

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: I rarely leave product reviews but this product deserves one. The quality of the product is terrible. It literally fell apart within 2 months of purchasing it. This is unacceptable. They surface is a vinyl sticker and it started bubbling within a few days of use. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Der Ananian

customer_reviews.title: My boys love it!!
customer_reviews.text: My twins are always trying to play with my husband and I but can never make it to the board with the traditional corn hole game. These are just perfect for them. They set it up next to ours and play for hours. They conveniently Velcro together so they can clean up when they are done playing and carry them back to the garage. The bags seem sturdy but we've only had it for about one month.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for an outdoor end of year party for 3rd graders. Great overall quality, a big plus that it can be put together with the bags inside and carried! One velcro piece was loose and may come off, but not a huge problem. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Always enjoy the products.
customer_reviews.text: The gift was for my granddaughters. I'm sure they enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Leon B. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great for Kids
customer_reviews.text: This set is smaller than official size, but I knew that when I ordered. It's a good buy for the money, and my six year-old grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: We bought as a gift for another couple but it’s comically small. We bought a full size one instead. Missed the return window. Description has been updated but previously it wasn’t clear.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable for little children. However they are much smaller than I anticipated. My 6 year old looks too big for them.
customer_reviews.author: Kylene N Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Cheap overall: good for little kids though
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a 2 overall because the laminate had bubbled up before we even opened it for the first time. Doesn’t really harm game play though (for a 5 & 7 year old) so I didn’t want to bother sending it back!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Mader

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I would have liked, but the kids still like it. I wouldn't recommend this for adults unless you are limited on space.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin O

customer_reviews.title: Great for entertaining toddlers too!
customer_reviews.text: Our 22 month old is too young to understand the game of cornhole just yet but she does like to take the little bags and move them from one hole to the other. Looking forward to next year when she can really enjoy it, because the set is lightweight and easy to fold and take places. Good value. Note that this is not a regular size cornhole game, but a smaller version
customer_reviews.author: M. Lindley

customer_reviews.title: Quality is surprisingly good. Not meant for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: Used this to create a "Death Star Trench Bombing" game for a birthday party. Way cheaper than a full sized cornhole set, and even, probably, than building it myself. Quality is surprisingly good. Not meant for outdoors, but I think it would work fine as long as it doesn't stay out through the seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Law

customer_reviews.title: great game
customer_reviews.text: I like the portable close up and put it away. my 4 1/2 yr old and 1yr dog love this game indoors and outdoor
customer_reviews.author: D. D. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Missing Pieces/Parts
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a Christmas gift for my nephew. I did not open the box to check if all the pieces were there, as it was taped. Now that the weather is warm, my nephew got it out to play with, and 3 of the six bags are missing from the box and my return time has expired. Extremely disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: shenanigans

customer_reviews.title: Play corn hole all year long!
customer_reviews.text: Why wait until the summer to practice your skills, when you can do it indoors and have fun at parties
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Dee

customer_reviews.title: Small and somewhat cheap but does the job.
customer_reviews.text: It's wood design not actual wood. The wood design is like a peel and stick and started bubbling up on the first 2 days we had it. It's small but good to have your kids play indoors. My kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lupe R.

customer_reviews.title: avoid
customer_reviews.text: Not even a month into buying this product, it started falling off. The legs came off due to the glue not adhering well. Not sturdy at all , keeps moving while playing. Returning it. Avoid buying if can
customer_reviews.author: Yurvi

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids
customer_reviews.text: Size is great for the kids however the stickers on the one board are bubbled and will most likely not last to long.
customer_reviews.author: Kim K.

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids and adults.
customer_reviews.text: A great game for kids to begin with, but then adults always find a way to play against each other.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Elise ferrara

customer_reviews.title: Great game for young children
customer_reviews.text: Will use it in the house, back yard and on vacation to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Richard F.

customer_reviews.title: Simple design, great value
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy game. I don’t play cornhole all that much, so I didn’t want to spend the money on it because I knew we would only use it a few times a year. I was please and it is made well enough that with proper care should last many years
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the money! Well made sturdy boards. Looks like they redesigned it. Great bags, great price!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Best ever , better that a full size. Just right for the basement. Half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Janet  H.

customer_reviews.title: Picture of the product on the outside of the box it ships in.
customer_reviews.text: This product came with pictures of the game on the outside of the box it was delivered in. During Christmas time! I'm so annoyed and mad I'm not even opening it. I'm just returning it. Every single one of my kids saw it. Plus it's tiny. I usually check the size of products before I buy. I didn't in this case and it's smaller than any Cornhole game I've ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Skeen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to store
customer_reviews.text: Like the size super lightweight. Perfect for a child’s outdoor party.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Cates

customer_reviews.title: Meant for kids, not adults
customer_reviews.text: This is, for sure, a kids version of cornhole. I thought the size was going to be a little small for adults, but it is just too small. Place them any more than 10 feet apart (decent adult distance) and they are too small of a target to hit. Perfect for kids who want to be five feet apart but just too small for adults.
customer_reviews.author: Josh the Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Top layer is a sticker and came peeling off
customer_reviews.text: This would have been perfect but the top layer came out of the box already peeling it off making it look cheap. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Britt. S.

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Will recommend not to buy this product. The paper they stick was already having bubbles underneath when I received the product, I thought I can fix it but now I see multiple of those.
customer_reviews.author: Annonymous

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Made real cheap...top coat on both I got was bubbled and wrinkled
customer_reviews.author: Linda Berg

customer_reviews.title: Great overall
customer_reviews.text: This was an Easter gift for our 4 year old grandson. Very impressed with the quality and ease of use and storing.
customer_reviews.author: fwcindyt

customer_reviews.title: Corn Hole Game
customer_reviews.text: What could be wrong with two slant boards with a hole in them and some bean bags. Great game, we love them.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy J Bray

customer_reviews.title: Nice small set
customer_reviews.text: Junior is a little smaller than i expected but it well made and the bags have a good weight. No durability issues after 3 weeks
customer_reviews.author: DM1973

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: It may be small but my family and I are having a great time playing this.
customer_reviews.author: suzanne wright

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game set for my grandsons ages 3 and 5 and they love it. It is the perfect size for little ones. I highly recommend it. Easy to fold up and carry too.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I noticed after our first time usiit it was already showing signs of wear. The nails were coming out. After two uses the entire board fell apart. The material are so cheap you cannot fix it without causing severe damage. It is not worth the money. If you want something even to get through a summer don’t buy this
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Reichert

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The cover on the board was bubbled on the edges. I bought this for my granddaughter. I was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Moore

customer_reviews.title: Junior cornhole
customer_reviews.text: Returned because they are Juniors I miss read this item
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Not durable or sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The edges fell off of two sides of one of the wood pieces after less than a week of light use. This isn’t durable or sturdy and I would not purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: JoannaH

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart
customer_reviews.text: The back support bar Broke already. Not sturdy at all
customer_reviews.author: Ashleybri90

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son's birthday. Good quality and fun. Smaller version for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Williams,cffdgvn :) jhyuiuy

customer_reviews.title: My daughters love playing this
customer_reviews.text: My daughters love playing this. I wish the legs had grips on the bottom because the boards slide while playing on a smooth surface. Bean bags are a good quality. No problems with them leaking or breaking.
customer_reviews.author: L. Stillwell

customer_reviews.title: Nice paint job and substantial bean bags
customer_reviews.text: Nice paint job and substantial bean bags. Should give us years of service. The handy fold out legs and storage capacity a real plus.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn McMullen

customer_reviews.title: Seems like the game and bean bags will hold up well
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived today. Kids wanted me to open the box immediately. First impression was the solid construction. Seems like the game and bean bags will hold up well, even against two active toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: BionicPenis

customer_reviews.title: Pretty fun idea for the office break times
customer_reviews.text: Pretty fun idea for the office break times. Decently durable, but the legs can get a little loose and the boards bounce when the bags hit causing the legs to close a little each time until it just falls flat. It's not too small, definitely smaller than official size corn hole, but perfect indoor size, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought, but I could have read the size chart. Nonetheless, it brings hours of fun at family gatherings.
customer_reviews.author: leo

customer_reviews.title: Good designe but need to be rain resisistent.
customer_reviews.text: Looked nice originally, but, when rain hit the surface of the set, the top plastic sheet warped and peeled. Also, the color of red and blue washed. We were very disappointed. The design is good but it need to be water resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Hiei Ando

customer_reviews.title: Great size for kids or travel toy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my kids (2 and 5 years). Also fits great in the car for the park or as a travel toy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie W

customer_reviews.title: Good materials, smart design.
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy, adorable and even have handles and stick together with Velcro for easy transport. Great design and made with good materials.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ramos

customer_reviews.title: This can be played in the house in bad weather. They all loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Thesesre great because you can fold it up and take it with you. The adults liked it as much as the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Catlover

customer_reviews.title: Adjusting space for little people to play to
customer_reviews.text: Grand ma and grandson had fun playing with it. Don't know if Velcro will hold up , was easy to handle from car to playground
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok for cost
customer_reviews.text: One gets what one pays for. Nothing against advertised claims.
customer_reviews.author: Meakee Kollet

customer_reviews.title: Great way to keep the kids busy indoors.
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids loved this! Decent quality and a good size for indoor -outdoor use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price
customer_reviews.text: love this game and great price.... great for kids and adults at parties or just when you want to get out of the house
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: I like that it’s small and portable ... stores easy
customer_reviews.author: Misti Ready

customer_reviews.title: Was skeptical, but was a worthwhile purchase.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. If you're wanting something for the adults at a grill out to play with, this is probably not the right choice, but could be for you, not me. I got these as a portable game option for my young kids, and they love it. They are small and light, and stick together, so they are great to just toss in the car to have available for a distraction or to have a little fun. I'm impressed with the construction given the size and cost. Summary: Not Full sized, kid fun sized. Very portable. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Good time
customer_reviews.text: the family enjoyed playing this. It was fun for the kids & adults
customer_reviews.author: CvPrincess18

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a yard party. Items came packed very well. The smaller size was perfect for moving around.
customer_reviews.author: Motor City Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Kids enjoy it
customer_reviews.text: It is defiantly a cheap set of mini boards. I wish I would have realized it only came with 3 bags in each color. I was hoping this would mimic the real cornhole boards/game more. They work great for the kids to play around with in the house.
customer_reviews.author: MagG

customer_reviews.title: The kids love playing cornhole
customer_reviews.text: We purchased it for my twins birthday, all the kids had fun playing cornhole.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy

customer_reviews.title: My grandchildren love this and the size is perfect for little ones ...
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren love this and the size is perfect for little ones - not difficult to move or transport. Well made and sturdy. Would highly recommend for children!!!
customer_reviews.author: NanP

customer_reviews.title: Nice option for young kids
customer_reviews.text: This cornhole art was great for our young grandchildren. I added some super hero stickers on them to make them a little more fun. One was slightly chipped but doesn't affect how they play.
customer_reviews.author: CMS

customer_reviews.title: Thought was bigger
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was bigger however my kids love it
customer_reviews.author: Alysha Hart

customer_reviews.title: Great for indoors and travel
customer_reviews.text: Although it's quite small, it's perfect for parties inside. Much easier to carry these around versus regulation sized boards all the time. Think of its length about the same length as a regular skateboard.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect junior boards
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my nephew's 4th birthday. They are the perfect size for him. There is velcrow on the bottom edge of the boards so you can put the beanbags inside and carry or easily store them, no items lost. Him and his brother are always trying to play on the adult boards so now they have their very own.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Warren

customer_reviews.title: I know it's inexpensive and I didn't have high expectations ...
customer_reviews.text: I know it's inexpensive and I didn't have high expectations but the one important thing to know is that it is not intended for outdoor use. We have taken it on two weekend camping trips and expect it may make it two more before it's trashed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Eaton

product_meta.title: GoSports Portable Size Cornhole Game Set with 6 Bean Bags - Great for Indoor & Outdoor Play (Choose Between Classic or Wood Designs)
feature_bullets: UNPLUG AND GET ACTIVE: Includes 2 boards, 6 bean bags, and rules - fun for BBQS, office breaks, parties, tailgating and encouraging outdoor play
COMPACT SET: Add some fun to smaller indoor spaces like offices, dorms, and living room and a perfect set for taking on the go!
STURDY AND PORTABLE DESIGN: Boards hook-and-loop together to store bags inside and are easy to transport with attached carrying handles
TRAVEL SIZE: Boards measure 2' x 1' x 8" tall
